short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With a plugin, you can automatically trigger builds of your project that are associated with a specific pull-request.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome plugin is designed specifically for GitLab user. It enables you to streamline your workflow by adding buttons to the pull-request page that allow you to initiate a build process in TeamCity with just a few clicks.

With this plugin installed, you can easily monitor the status of your build jobs and receive real-time notifications on your GitLab page. This feature saves you time and improves your productivity by reducing the need to switch between different applications and platforms.

To use this plugin, you must have a TeamCity account and access to the GitLab repository that you want to build.
